train_finrl_model.py.role: Train a FinRL agent using configuration from models/finrl/config.json.

watchlist_loop.py.role: Example IA loop executing automatic scalping.

realtime/pump_detector.py.role: Detection de mouvements de prix anormaux et trailing stop.

intelligence/local_llm.py.role: Wrapper around a local Llama model.

intelligence/learning_loop.py.role: Simple AI trading loop using simulated trades.

utils/utils_signaux.py.role: Fonctions pour détecter les signaux techniques d'achat.

utils/performance_metrics.py.role: Utility functions to compute trading performance metrics.

simulation/simulate_trade_result.py.role: Simulation d’un trade avec calcul de frais, SL/TP, gain net.

scripts/test_import.py.role: Basic import test for optional GUI utilities.

scripts/detect_tickers_from_news.py.role: Automatic ticker detection from pharma-related news.

scripts/mock_db_fill.py.role: Create a small set of rows in trades.db for testing purposes.

monitoring/watchdog_conditions.py.role: IA watchdog module for automatic opportunity detection.
